natural solution: Place under one square root and simplify: \begin{align} \sqrt{15}\cdot\sqrt{35} &= \sqrt{15\cdot35}\\ &=\sqrt{3\cdot5^2\cdot7}\\ &=\sqrt{5^2}\cdot\sqrt{3\cdot7}\\ &= \boxed{5\sqrt{21}} \end{align}
